underlying_goal: Restructure and refactor a large README.md for a reverse ETL architecture research project by splitting content into appendix files, correcting terminology (DLT→SDP), and reorganizing scalability analysis for 1000+ tenants
brief_summary: User asked to implement a streaming query analysis writeup in a README (completed), then asked to split the README into appendix files, fix DLT→SDP naming, and reorganize scalability for 1000+ tenants; Claude produced a detailed plan but the session ended before full implementation.
